StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetNumberofNWAsRSS]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Organiza.onID integer, @MonthBeginDate date.me, @MonthEndDate date.me = NULL, @NewRSS bit, @NWAs integer OUTPUT AS SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @TotalNWAs DECIMAL DECLARE @AVG DECIMAL (4,1) DECLARE @NumRSSs INT DECLARE @MonthsInDateRange INT
SELECT @MonthEndDate = COALESCE(@MonthEndDate, @MonthBeginDate) SELECT @MonthsInDateRange = DATEDIFF(MONTH, @MonthBeginDate, @MonthEndDate)
--- if the RSS has been open at least 3 months (@NewRSS = 0) then get its number of contracts IF @NewRSS = 0 BEGIN
SET @NWAs = (SELECT COUNT(NWA.NWA_ID) FROM NWA WHERE NWA.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = @Organiza.onID AND COALESCE(NWA.COMP_CHANGE_FLAG, 'N') != 'Y' AND DATEDIFF(MONTH, NWA.NWA_DECLARED_DATE, @MonthBeginDate) BETWEEN 1 - @MonthsInDateRange AND 3) END ELSE BEGIN /* IF THIS RSS HAS BEEN OPEN LESS THAN 3 MONTHS THEN GET THE AVERAGE NUMBER OF CONTRACTS FOR ALL THE RSSs UNDER THE PARENT RS */ SET @TotalNWAs = (SELECT COUNT(NWA.NWA_ID) FROM NWA INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP OM ON NWA.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = OM.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE OM.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = (SELECT OM2.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID FROM ORGANIZATION_MAP OM2 WHERE OM2.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = @Organiza.onID) AND COALESCE(NWA.COMP_CHANGE_FLAG, 'N') != 'Y' AND DATEDIFF(MONTH, NWA.NWA_DECLARED_DATE, @MonthBeginDate) BETWEEN 1 - @MonthsInDateRange AND 3)
SET @NumRSSs = (SELECT COUNT(RO.ORGANIZATION_ID) FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RO INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP OM ON RO.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE OM.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = (SELECT OM2.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID FROM ORGANIZATION_MAP OM2 WHERE OM2.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = @Organiza.onID) AND RO.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'RSS' AND RO.ISOPEN = 'Y')
IF @NumRSSs > 0 BEGIN SET @AVG = @TotalNWAs/@NumRSSs END ELSE BEGIN SET @AVG = 0 END
--- ROUND THE AVERAGE UP AND RETURN THE NUMBER OF NWAs SET @NWAs = CEILING(@AVG)
END
/* OLD WAY
ALTER PROCEDURE sp_GetNumberofNWAsRSS @Organiza.onID integer, @MonthBeginDate date.me, @NWAs integer OUTPUT AS
SET @NWAs = (SELECT COUNT(NWA.NWA_ID) FROM NWA WHERE NWA.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = @Organiza.onID AND NWA.NWA_DECLARED_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(m, -3, @MonthBeginDate) AND DATEADD(d, -1, @MonthBeginDate))
*/
SET NOCOUNT OFF
